New York, NY - Full-time

We're hiring a Ruby/Javascript developer at Curbed Network.

Curbed Network publishes the sites Eater, Curbed and Racked nationally and in local markets all over the US. Our tech team is small, no-bullshit, and productive. Our projects are built with Sinatra, MongoDB, jQuery and Redis.

Contact tech-jobs@curbed.com with your plaintext or PDF resume, GitHub, etc.
